item.title: 今年将年满 90 岁的雪莉-麦克莱恩（Shirley MacLaine）表示，她将继续演戏，"直到我死掉或其他什么为止"。她与彼得-丁克拉格（Peter Dinklage）共同主演了《美国梦者》（American Dreamer）。
item.description:
Shirley MacLaine, who will turn 90 this year, says she'll continue acting "until I just drop dead or something." She stars alongside Peter Dinklage in "American Dreamer." pic.twitter.com/0Yh6EzFITC

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) March 12, 2024

item.title: 威尔士王妃凯特周一为她修改肯辛顿宫发布的一张照片所造成的 "混乱 "道歉。
item.description:
Kate, Princess of Wales, apologized Monday for “confusion” caused by her altering of a photo released by Kensington Palace.

Several news agencies that initially published the image, including The Associated Press, withdrew the photo over concerns about digital manipulation. pic.twitter.com/5v4VD52Ray

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 12, 2024

item.title: 尤金-李维（Eugene Levy）可能会因为工作而经常旅行，但这并不意味着他乐在其中。这位演员最近推出了新一季的 "不情愿的旅行者"（The Reluctant Traveler）节目，他将探访欧洲一些鲜为人知的地方。
item.description:
Eugene Levy may travel a lot for his work, but that doesn’t mean he enjoys it. The actor recently launched a new season of “The Reluctant Traveler,” where he visits lesser-known places in Europe. pic.twitter.com/Mul8Pzqtv0

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) March 11, 2024

item.title: "由长期合作伙伴贾丝廷-特里埃特（Justine Triet）和亚瑟-哈拉里（Arthur Harari）编剧的《堕落解剖》（Anatomy of a Fall）荣获 #奥斯卡最佳原创剧本奖。阅读美联社的影评。
item.description:
"Anatomy of a Fall," written by longtime partners Justine Triet and Arthur Harari, won best original screenplay at the #Oscars. Read AP's review of the film. https://t.co/X4lk1HwwXU

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 克里斯托弗-诺兰（Christopher Nolan）与他的制片人妻子艾玛-托马斯（Emma Thomas）一起凭借《奥本海默》（Oppenheimer）获得奥斯卡最佳导演奖和最佳影片奖，这可能是一个不争的事实。但许多人都认为诺兰早该加冕奥斯卡最佳导演和最佳影片了，这实在令人激动：
item.description:
Christopher Nolan’s Oscar win for best director — and best picture for “Oppenheimer,” along with his producer wife Emma Thomas — may have been a forgone conclusion. But it was thrilling to behold a coronation many thought was overdue.

More highlights: https://t.co/gjNQAzivbX pic.twitter.com/fyIKZwpE8j

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 北约正在其新扩大的北欧领土上举行军事演习。来自 13 个国家的 20,000 多名士兵参加了此次演习，这是自冷战以来规模最大的一次。
item.description:
NATO is holding military drills in its newly expanded Nordic territory. More than 20,000 soldiers from 13 nations are taking part in the exercises that are the largest since the Cold War. pic.twitter.com/qNrJ0fPML5

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 随着海地暴力危机的加剧，布林肯将出席与加勒比地区领导人的紧急会议

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 在参加 SXSW 大会期间，苏塞克斯公爵夫人梅根分享说，她在网上遭受的 "大部分欺凌和虐待 "都是在她怀着她和哈里王子的孩子 Archie 和 Lilibet 的时候发生的。
item.description:
While at SXSW, Meghan the Duchess of Sussex shared that the "bulk of the bullying and abuse" that she experienced online came when she was pregnant with her and Prince Harry's children, Archie and Lilibet. pic.twitter.com/IvZq2BYFym

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) March 11, 2024

item.title: 佛罗里达州野生动物官员说，一头大型抹香鲸在佛罗里达州墨西哥湾沿岸的沙洲上搁浅后引起了全国的关注，目前已经死亡。据测量，这条鲸鱼长约 44 英尺，大约有一辆大型校车那么大。
item.description:
A large sperm whale that drew national attention after beaching itself on a sandbar along Florida’s Gulf Coast has died, state wildlife officials said. The whale was measured at about 44 feet long, roughly the size of a large school bus. pic.twitter.com/QS9zjK8EVC

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 11, 2024
